markdownRemark.html:
Dear Action Diary,

Today I took the road less traveled.

I’ve never wanted to be defined by one job description
one title
one area
one genre.

But that’s what people get rewarded for.

Pick a path
follow that path
excel at that path
and get rewarded for it.

Is that the way the world works?
But that doesn’t sound like me.

What does sound like me?
I
Will run down a path
Then wonder whats over there
Where did these flowers on this path come from?
Let’s follow that bird instead!\

How are paths made?
By someone walking through it first.
So many people have walked down this path.
It’s wide.
It’s clear.
It’s easy to traverse.
That’s when I want to stray away.
I want to feel wild grass brush against my calves.
I want my clothes to catch on stray branches.
I want to explore and find and discover.
